sentences.sentence: President Zelensky has hailed his first phone call with China's Xi Jinping as meaningful and a powerful impetus to bilateral relations.

sentences.sentence: President Zelensky has attended a ceremony to mark the 37th anniversary of Chernobyl, the world's worst civilian nuclear accident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: People fleeing the fighting in Sudan speak of their fear and their relief at getting out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said he had a meaningful phone call with his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: in their first phone call since russia's invasion of ukraine in a tweet zelensky wrote that he believed the call and the appointment of a ukrainian ambassador to china would give a powerful impetus to the development of bilateral relations china and russia have been strengthening their bilateral ties since before Russia's invasion of Ukraine last year an invasion that China has declined to condemn the diplomatic drive culminates with cheese visit to Moscow in March during which he and Vladimir Putin signed a cooperation agreement president Zelensky call for talks with Xi in March.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Although China's relations with Moscow have remained cordial, it hasn't recognized Russia's annexation of Ukrainian territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The pain of the memory of the Chernobyl tragedy overlaps today in Ukraine with the pain of war. A ceremony at the infamous atomic power plant paid tribute to the victims of the largest civilian nuclear catastrophe in history. It happened 37 years ago during failed safety tests that ended with the explosion of one of its reactors, releasing huge amounts of radiation into the atmosphere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In Kyiv, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky laid a bouquet of flowers in honour of the so-called liquidators of the former Soviet Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The president said that the accident left a huge wound all over the world, adding that the plant was occupied for weeks by Russians at the beginning of the invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The world must do its utmost, he insisted, to make Russia and Ukraine get rid of the nuclear power facilities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A Russian missile that destroyed a museum in the city of Kupyansk in the Kharkiv region of eastern Ukraine claimed two lives, the director and deputy director.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The attack damaged several other buildings and injured a further six people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian officials said there was no reason for around three and a half hours. Kupyansk, which has been the scene of fighting in recent months, was hit by several Russian C-300 missiles on Tuesday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, the press team of the leader of the Wagner mercenary group released a video purporting to show Yevgeny Prigozhin touting for more recruits to fight for Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Wagner group is thought to be crucial to Moscow's military efforts in Ukraine. But Prigozhin has, on more than one occasion, been critical of the Russian Ministry of Defense for the lack of results on the front.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian officials are reporting that evacuation measures are being implemented in some Russian-controlled towns in occupied parts of the Zaporizhia region. They said last week that the Russian-backed authorities in nearby Enerhodar were planning to arrange the evacuation of children from the town early in May. Russian Milblogers expressed continued concerns over a possible Ukrainian counteroffensive along the Zaporizhia region frontline in the coming weeks. According to the Institute for the Study of War, Russian Milblogos claimed that Ukrainian forces are concentrating in the Zaporizhia region and are preparing to strike toward Orykiv, 50 kilometers southeast of Zaporizhia city, Rabotine, 14 kilometers south of Orykiv and Ocheretuvate, 29 kilometers southeast of Orykiv. Moscowow appointed a zaporozhian region occupation deputy vladimir rogov claimed that ukrainian forces are concentrating near hulai poland actively deploying equipment along the zaporozhia region front line rogov claimed that ukrainian forces may attempt to cross the kahovka reservoir to take an ergo dar or reach the sea of azur and take the zaporiya nuclear power plant after a successful counter-offensive russian bloggers continued to issue beam and denials that ukrainian forces established sustained positions on east bank herson region the mill bloggers amplified textual reports and video claims from Russian military personnel claiming that Ukrainian forces are not on the East Bank Harrison region and that the situation here is under control. Ukrainian authorities are meeting their Italian counterparts to discuss

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: how to build back areas in the country destroyed by Russia's war. Our Rome correspondent Georgia Orlandi has more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: reconstruction efforts. As of now the EU has made available around 49 billion euros in military humanitarian and financial aid to Ukraine. The president of the European Commission recently said that the bloc needs to intervene in the reconstruction process as part of Ukraine's path toward the EU. So around 700 people representing businesses but also both Italian and Ukrainian institutions and organizations have gathered here today in Rome for the same reasons. And this is part of Italy's efforts to help the country. Let's remind ourselves that over one hundred seventy thousand Ukrainian refugees have arrived here in Italy. The aim today is for these companies and organizations to understand how to address Ukraine's needs. to attract more international key players. And although the next conference to discuss Ukraine reconstruction efforts which is taking place in London is going to be a more international event, the aim of today's conference is to strengthen Italy's involvement in the conflict and its role in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Giorgio Orlandi for Euronews in Rome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A plane carrying 245 passengers arrived in Paris on Wednesday morning, the latest in a series of emergency flights. On a vécu une semaine de chaos et on ne peut être que satisfait.

sentences.sentence: The feeling I had since the first day of the clashes, I felt really paralyzed, I didn't know what to do, I didn't know how to get out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, more than 1,000 evacuees from 58 different countries arrived at a naval base in Jeddah in Saudi Arabia, including citizens of the US, the UK, France, Turkey and Yemen.

sentences.sentence: While Joe Biden so far seems to have little competition from his fellow Democrats, he could, of course, be up against the inimitable Donald Trump, who does have some rivals on his own team.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The streets of Tel Aviv filled with people on Tuesday night and into Wednesday, protesting against judicial reforms by the Israeli government headed by Benjamin Netanyahu.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The reforms take powers away from the Supreme Court and give more power to the government when it comes to appointing judges, something opponents estimate weakens the fight against corruption while also undermining Israel's democracy.
